Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Laramie
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Central and Montrose due to, street blockage near Montrose/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Central and Montrose due to, street blockage near Montrose/Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.
